summary.purpose: Provides all granular table sub-components (Filter, MaxRowsLabel, DisplayAllRowsButton, ExportToExcel, Search, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Summary) plus specialized cell renderers for common data types (TimesUI for timestamps, TableButton for CRUD actions, DurationUI for time durations, PhoneUI for phone numbers, BooleanUi for boolean values, GeoUi for geo coordinates, NumberUI for numbers).
summary.problem_solved: Breaks down the monolithic table into memoized sub-components so each can render and update independently without re-rendering unaffected siblings. Provides ready-made, type-safe cell renderers eliminating the need to implement custom formatting for common data types.

external.why_used: React core for hooks (memo, useEffect, useMemo, useRef, useState), context consumption, and component composition.
external.name: react

external.why_used: createPortal for rendering filter popup outside table container to prevent clipping by overflow:auto.
external.name: react-dom

external.why_used: Provides TObject generic type for table data objects and Geo type for GeoUi component.
external.name: akeyless-types-commons

external.why_used: cn() utility for conditional CSS class composition across all components.
external.name: @/lib/utils

internal.why_used: Required dependency for FilterProps type and Direction type.
Required dependency for useTableContext hook used by all sub-components.
Required dependency for SVG icons (emptyFilterSvg, slashFilterSvg, sortSvg, exportToExcelSvg, RedXSvg2).
Required dependency for getFixedNumber and renderOnce utilities.
Required dependency for timestamp_to_string function used by TimesUI component.
Required dependency for exportToExcel function used by ExportToExcel component.
Required dependency for Button component used by TableButton.

symbols.name: Filter

params.name: filterableColumn
params.description: Object containing header (display text), dataKey (column key to filter), and optional ui function for custom value rendering in dropdown.

params.name: index
params.description: Column index in headers array, used to determine popup position and RTL/LTR alignment.

returns.description: Filter button and conditional portal popup for multi-select filtering.

symbols.description: Memoized filter button component rendered in table headers. Displays active filter state via SVG icons (empty/filled filter), opens/closes a portal-rendered dropdown popup for multi-select filtering. Popup positions left or right depending on RTL/LTR direction and column position. Includes checkbox list of unique column values with optional custom UI formatting.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized filter column header component with dropdown popup for multi-select filtering.

details.what_it_does: Renders filter button with state-dependent SVG icon (emptyFilterSvg when no filters active, slashFilterSvg when filters applied). On button click, toggles display of filter popup portal. Popup contains checkbox list of all unique values for the column, sorted alphabetically. Includes clear filter button and close button. Position calculated based on button rect and direction (RTL/LTR). Listens to window resize/scroll events to update popup position. Uses createPortal to render outside table container so popup is not clipped by overflow:auto.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders absolute-positioned filter button (text-[12px]) with tooltip. When open, renders a fixed z-[30] portal popup (192px wide, 208px tall) with checkbox list, header with filter label and action buttons, and scrollable options area. Popup appears left or right of button depending on column position and direction.

minimal_correct.title: Basic filter in table header

extensive_correct.title: Filter with custom value formatting

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Using Filter outside table context

symbols.name: MaxRowsLabel

returns.description: Pagination status label showing row counts.

symbols.description: Memoized pagination status label component displaying counts. Shows: 'maxRowsLabel1 {displayedCount} maxRowsLabel2 {filteredTotalCount}'. Example: 'Showing 10 of 150 items'. Uses renderOnce memoization to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized label showing current pagination state (displayed rows vs filtered total).

details.what_it_does: Extracts maxRowsLabel1, maxRowsLabel2, maxRows, displayAllRows, and dataToRender from table context. Calculates displayed count: if displayAllRows is true OR rendered data exceeds maxRows, shows full rendered count; otherwise shows maxRows limit. Displays: '{maxRowsLabel1} {displayedCount} {maxRowsLabel2} {filteredTotal}'.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders flex row with text-lg gap-1 containing four elements: label1 text, displayed count number, label2 text, and filtered total count. CSS classes: justify-start items-center text-lg gap-1, plus optional maxRowsContainerClassName.

minimal_correct.title: Basic pagination label

extensive_correct.title: Pagination with search filtering

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Using without Table context

symbols.name: DisplayAllRowsButton
symbols.description: Memoized pagination toggle button. Switches between paginated (maxRows limit) and all-rows display mode. Button shows count of what will be displayed when clicked. Styled with green background (#547f22), white text, rounded corners. Uses renderOnce memoization.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized toggle button to switch between paginated and all-rows display modes.

details.what_it_does: Toggles displayAllRows state when clicked. Calculates display count: if displayAllRows is true, shows limited (maxRows) count; if false, shows total filtered count. Renders button with label and count. Supports custom button props via displayAllRowsButtonProps and custom label via displayAllRowsButtonLabel.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders styled button with background-color #547f22, white text, px-3 py-1.5, rounded-md, with hover:bg-[#3e671f] and focus:outline-none. Contains flex gap-1 with label text and count number.

minimal_correct.title: Basic display-all toggle

extensive_correct.title: Custom button styling and label
extensive_correct.code: {/* Renders: "Load 120" or "Load 20" */}

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Button without pagination context

symbols.name: ExportToExcel

returns.description: Async function that exports table to Excel and resolves when complete.

symbols.description: Memoized button component that exports currently-displayed table data to Excel file. Handles optional data augmentation (prepending custom rows), summary row calculation (summing numeric columns), and Excel formatting (headline, alignment, direction). Async function that calls exportToExcel helper.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized button component that exports table data to Excel file with optional summary rows.

details.what_it_does: Extracts export config from context. If dataToAddToExcelTable provided, prepends custom rows to export data (adding headers). Maps exportToExcelKeys to column definitions. If sumColumns provided, calculates sum for each column (Number(cell) or 0) and appends summary rows. Calls exportToExcel helper with configured columns, data with summaries, headline, filename, and direction-specific cell formatting (horizontal alignment, reading order).
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders styled button with background-color #547f22, white text, px-2 py-[2px], rounded-lg, text-[16px]. Content is either exportExcelContent (custom ReactNode) or exportToExcelSvg() icon. Supports custom className via exportToExcelClassName.

minimal_correct.title: Basic export with selected columns

extensive_correct.title: Export with summary totals and custom data

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Export without specifying keys

symbols.name: Search

returns.description: Search input element with debounced multi-term search.

symbols.description: Memoized search input component. Renders text input connected to debounced search state. Multi-term search support: split query by '+' and match rows containing ALL terms (AND logic). Supports autoFocus and custom placeholder. Uses renderOnce memoization.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized search input component with debounced multi-term filtering support.

details.what_it_does: Extracts search state (searchQuery, handleSearch, searchPlaceHolder, autoFocus) from context. Renders input[type=search] with border-black border-[1px], text-lg, px-2, width 11/12. Value bound to searchQuery, onChange calls handleSearch. autoFocus attribute applied if true.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders search input with border-black border-[1px], text-lg px-2 w-11/12, applying custom searchInputClassName and searchInputStyle. Input is large and responsive, suitable for prominent toolbar placement.

minimal_correct.title: Basic search input
minimal_correct.code: {/* Filters across all columns */}

extensive_correct.title: Multi-term search with noneSearchKeys

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Search outside table context

symbols.name: TableHead

returns.description: Table header element with columns, sort indicators, and filter buttons.

symbols.description: Memoized table header component. Renders <thead> with sticky positioning and dark background. Each <th> is clickable for sorting (if sortKeys provided). Displays sort indicator SVG (sortSvg) for active sort column. Includes Filter button for filterable columns. Uses renderOnce memoization.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized table header component rendering columns with sort indicators and filter buttons.

details.what_it_does: Maps headers array and renders <th> for each column. If sortKeys provided, makes header clickable (cursor-pointer) and onClick calls handleSort(index). Renders sort SVG (sortSvg() or sortSvg(true) for asc) if sortColumn === index. For each header, checks if filterable column exists and renders Filter component. Uses useMemo to compute sortDisplay boolean.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders <thead> with bg-black/50 text-white sticky z-10 top-0. Each <th> has px-2 text-center h-6 relative w-fit max-w-[130px]. Header text in px-2 div, sort SVG absolutely positioned, Filter component absolutely positioned top-1 right-1.

minimal_correct.title: Basic table header without sorting
minimal_correct.code: {/* Headers with no sorting capability */}

extensive_correct.title: Header with sort and filter
extensive_correct.code: {/* Header renders: */} {/* Name (clickable, shows sort SVG when active) */} {/* Department (clickable, shows sort SVG, has Filter button) */} {/* Salary (clickable, shows sort SVG) */}

incorrect.title: Incorrect: TableHead outside context

symbols.name: TableBody

returns.description: Table body element with data rows.

symbols.description: Memoized table body component. Renders <tbody> mapping dataToRender.renderedData (filtered/sorted/paginated) to TableRow components. Applies divide-y divide-gray-600 styling. Uses renderOnce memoization.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized table body component rendering filtered/sorted/paginated data rows.

details.what_it_does: Renders <tbody> element. Maps dataToRender.renderedData array, creating TableRow component for each item with item data and index. Applies tableBodyClassName if provided.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders <tbody> with divide-y divide-gray-600 and optional tableBodyClassName. Contains multiple <tr> elements from TableRow.

minimal_correct.title: Basic table body rendering
minimal_correct.code: {/* Renders one for each user */}

extensive_correct.title: Body with custom styling
extensive_correct.code: {/* Tbody has custom bg and text color */}

symbols.name: TableRow

params.name: item
params.description: Single row data object.

params.name: index
params.description: Zero-indexed row position in rendered data.

symbols.description: Table data row component (not memoized). Renders single <tr> with click handler. Supports zebra striping (alternating row colors), row selection highlighting, and custom row className functions. Maps keysToRender to TableCell components.
symbols.description_one_line: Table data row component with click handling, zebra striping, and row selection support.

details.what_it_does: Accepts item (row data) and index. Applies zebra striping classes based on odd/even index. Applies rowClassName base classes and custom className from rowClassNameFunction (if provided). Applies selectedRow className if selectedRow.rowIndex === index. On click, calls selectedRow.onChange(index) and onRowClick(item, index). Maps keysToRender to render one TableCell per column value.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders <tr> with hover:bg-[#808080] hover:text-[#fff] hover effect, optional zebra striping (even/odd row colors), custom row className, and optional selected row highlight. Contains <td> cells from TableCell.

minimal_correct.title: Basic row rendering

extensive_correct.title: Row with zebra striping and selection

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Direct TableRow usage (should use TableBody)

symbols.name: TableCell

params.name: value
params.description: Cell value to render (string, number, boolean, React.ReactNode, etc.).

symbols.description: Table data cell component rendering a single <td>. Applies text overflow truncation (max-w-[130px]), ellipsis styling. Sets title attribute for tooltip display of string/number/boolean values.
symbols.description_one_line: Table data cell component with text overflow truncation and tooltip support.

details.what_it_does: Renders <td> element. Sets title tooltip for string/number/boolean values (shows full value on hover). Applies cellStyle and cellClassName from context. Cell styling: chivo ellipsis _ellipsis text-start px-1 py-0.5 border-gray-400 border-[1px] w-fit max-w-[130px]. Renders value as-is (no custom formatting; use cell-level UI components like TimesUI, BooleanUi, etc. for formatting).
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders <td> with border-gray-400 border-[1px], text-start alignment, limited width max-w-[130px], ellipsis text overflow styling. Responsive to cellClassName and cellStyle props.

minimal_correct.title: Basic cell rendering
minimal_correct.code: {/* Renders: Alice Johnson with ellipsis overflow */}

extensive_correct.title: Cell with custom renderers

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Complex objects without formatting

symbols.name: Summary
symbols.description: Memoized footer component displaying sum/total calculations for specified columns. Iterates sumColumns, calculates numeric sum for each, and displays formatted value (using column's optional ui function). Uses renderOnce memoization.
symbols.description_one_line: Memoized footer component displaying sum/total calculations for specified columns.

details.what_it_does: Extracts summaryLabel, sumColumns, dataToRender, and summary styling from context. For each column in sumColumns, calculates numeric sum of column values (Number(v) or 0) using getFixedNumber for formatting. Renders label on left, and flex row of sums on right. Each sum formatted as: '{label} : {sum_value}'.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders div with summary styling (direction support, flex justify-between items-center, h-8, px-3, text-[18px] font-bold). Left side shows summaryLabel, right side shows flex gap-3 of sum calculations.

minimal_correct.title: Basic summary totals
minimal_correct.code: {/* Renders: "Summary" ... "Total : 1500" */}

extensive_correct.title: Summary with multiple columns and custom formatting
extensive_correct.code: `$${sum.toFixed(2)}` }, { label: 'Total Debits', dataKey: 'debits', ui: (sum) => `$${sum.toFixed(2)}` } ]} summaryLabel="Account Totals" > {/* Renders: "Account Totals" ... "Total Credits : $5000.00" "Total Debits : $1200.00" */}

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Summary without sumColumns

symbols.name: TimesUI

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Unix timestamp, ISO date string, or Date object to format.

params.name: format
params.description: Output format string (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'). See timestamp_to_string documentation.

params.name: fromFormat
params.description: Input format if timestamp is string (not ISO).

params.name: tz
params.description: Timezone to convert to (e.g., 'America/New_York').

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction for alignment ('ltr' or 'rtl').

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes.

params.name: defaultReturnedValue
params.description: Value to display if timestamp is invalid or falsy.

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for timestamp values. Converts timestamp using timestamp_to_string helper with optional format, timezone, and source format parameters. Renders in LTR direction with text overflow ellipsis and direction-aware text alignment. Useful for displaying creation dates, modification times, etc. in table cells.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for timestamp values with configurable formatting and timezone support.

details.what_it_does: Accepts timestamp and optional format, fromFormat, tz, className, and defaultReturnedValue. Calls timestamp_to_string helper to format timestamp. Renders in ltr direction with text-left/text-right based on RTL prop. Supports custom className. Includes title tooltip with formatted time.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders div with direction:ltr (forced LTR for timestamps), ellipsis text overflow styling, and direction-aware text alignment (text-right if RTL, text-left if LTR). Title attribute shows full formatted time.

minimal_correct.title: Basic timestamp formatting

extensive_correct.title: Timestamp with custom format and timezone

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Invalid timestamp format

symbols.name: TableButton

params.name: onClick
params.description: Callback fired when button is clicked.

params.name: title
params.description: Tooltip text on hover.

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes for icon (e.g., text color).

params.name: buttonClassName
params.description: Additional CSS classes for button element.

params.name: type
params.description: Button type determining icon or custom content rendering.

params.name: children
params.description: Custom content for 'custom' type button.

params.name: disabled
params.description: If true, button is disabled and click handler is ignored.

returns.description: Action button element with icon or custom content.

symbols.description: Reusable action button component for table cells. Supports four types: 'add' (plus icon), 'edit' (pen icon), 'delete' (trash icon), or 'custom' (custom children). Includes hover scale animation, disabled state styling, and smooth transitions. Useful for CRUD operation buttons in table rows.
symbols.description_one_line: Reusable action button component for table cells with add, edit, delete, or custom icon types.

details.what_it_does: Accepts onClick, title, className, type, children, disabled, and buttonClassName. Maps type to icon class. Applies base styling: transition-transform duration-500 scale-100, disabled:hover:cursor-not-allowed, disabled:text-black/40, hover:scale-110, disabled:hover:scale-100. For 'add' type, renders Button component; for 'edit'/'delete', renders button element with icon; for 'custom', renders button with children.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders button element with smooth scale animation on hover (100% → 110%), disabled state styling with opacity and cursor-not-allowed, and FontAwesome icons. Base classes apply transition and disabled styling.

minimal_correct.title: Basic CRUD buttons

extensive_correct.title: Buttons with custom styling and disabled state

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Missing onClick handler

symbols.name: DurationUI

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration in seconds (e.g., 3661 for 1 hour 1 minute 1 second).

params.name: daysLabel
params.description: Label text for days unit.

params.name: hoursLabel
params.description: Label text for hours unit.

params.name: minutesLabel
params.description: Label text for minutes unit.

params.name: secondsLabel
params.description: Label text for seconds unit.

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes.

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction for alignment.

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for duration values (in seconds). Converts seconds to days:hours:minutes:seconds format. Displays only non-zero time units (e.g., '2 d 5 h 30 m' if 0 seconds). Customizable labels for each time unit. Supports RTL/LTR alignment.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for duration values (seconds) displaying formatted days, hours, minutes, seconds.

details.what_it_does: Accepts duration (seconds), custom labels (daysLabel, hoursLabel, minutesLabel, secondsLabel), className, and direction. Uses useMemo to convert seconds to padded strings: days = floor(duration / 86400), hours = floor(remainder / 3600), etc. Renders only non-zero units. Builds title tooltip with all components. Supports RTL by flex justify-end or justify-start.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders div with ltr direction forced, flex gap-1, and direction-aware alignment. Shows only non-zero time units inline (e.g., '2 d 5 h 30 m'). Full formatted string in title attribute.

minimal_correct.title: Basic duration formatting

extensive_correct.title: Custom duration labels and direction
extensive_correct.code: const activities = [ { name: 'Session A', uptime: 259200 }, // 3 days { name: 'Session B', uptime: 7265 } // 2 hours 1 min 5 sec ]; {activities.map(act => ( {act.name} ))}

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Duration not in seconds

symbols.name: PhoneUI

params.name: phone
params.description: Phone number string to display.

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction for alignment ('ltr' or 'rtl').

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes.

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for phone number values. Renders phone number as text with LTR direction forced (phone numbers always display left-to-right). Supports direction-aware text alignment. Includes text overflow ellipsis and tooltip.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for phone numbers with RTL/LTR direction support.

details.what_it_does: Renders div with forced ltr direction. Applies direction-aware text alignment: text-right if direction === 'rtl', text-left otherwise. Includes ellipsis text overflow and title tooltip showing full phone number.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders div with direction:ltr forced, text overflow ellipsis styling, direction-aware text alignment, and tooltip. Text is displayed as-is, no formatting applied.

extensive_correct.title: Phone with RTL alignment

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Applying text formatting to phone

symbols.name: BooleanUi

params.name: value
params.description: Boolean value to display as icon.

params.name: size
params.description: Icon size (text-2xl for big, text-lg for small).

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes for icon.

params.name: trueUi
params.description: Custom UI to render when value is true (default: fa-check icon).

params.name: falseUi
params.description: Custom UI to render when value is false (default: fa-xmark icon).

returns.description: Boolean icon or custom UI node.

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for boolean values. Displays FontAwesome icons: fa-check for true, fa-xmark for false. Supports customizable icon sizes ('big' or 'small') and custom UI nodes for true/false states. Useful for status, enabled/disabled, active/inactive columns.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for boolean values displaying customizable icons for true/false states.

details.what_it_does: Renders conditional icon or custom UI node based on boolean value. If value === true, renders trueUi (default: fa-check icon); if false, renders falseUi (default: fa-xmark icon). Applies size styling: text-2xl for 'big' (default), text-lg for 'small'.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders FontAwesome icon (<i> element) or custom ReactNode. Size determines icon scale (text-2xl vs text-lg).

extensive_correct.title: Boolean with custom UI and colors

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Non-boolean value

symbols.name: GeoUi

params.name: value
params.description: Object containing lat/latitude and lng/longitude properties.

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes.

params.name: linkUi
params.description: Custom text/UI to display in link (default: ' {lng} {lat}').

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for geographic coordinates. Renders clickable link to Google Maps with latitude/longitude coordinates. Supports custom link UI text. Coordinates can use either (lat/lng) or (latitude/longitude) property names. Text overflow ellipsis and tooltip included.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for geographic coordinates with clickable Google Maps link.

details.what_it_does: Extracts latitude (value.lat or value.latitude) and longitude (value.lng or value.longitude). Calls getLocationUrl(lng, lat) to generate Google Maps URL. Renders <a> link to Google Maps with optional custom link text (linkUi) or default coordinate display. Supports custom className and text overflow.
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders <a> element styled as blue-500 link with hover:blue-700 underline, text-overflow ellipsis, and tooltip showing coordinates. Opens Google Maps in new tab on click.

minimal_correct.title: Basic geo coordinates link

extensive_correct.title: Geo with custom link text and properties

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Missing coordinates

symbols.name: NumberUI

params.name: number
params.description: Number or numeric string to display.

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction for alignment ('ltr' or 'rtl').

params.name: className
params.description: Additional CSS classes.

symbols.description: Cell renderer component for numeric values. Renders number as text with LTR direction forced (numbers always left-to-right). Supports direction-aware text alignment. Includes text overflow ellipsis and tooltip showing full number.
symbols.description_one_line: Cell renderer component for numeric values with RTL/LTR direction support and text overflow.

details.what_it_does: Renders div with forced ltr direction. Applies direction-aware text alignment: text-right if direction === 'rtl', text-left otherwise. Includes ellipsis text overflow and title tooltip showing full number. No formatting applied (use sumColumns with ui function for currency/percent formatting).
details.rendered_ui_description: Renders div with direction:ltr forced, text overflow ellipsis styling, direction-aware text alignment, and tooltip. Number displayed as-is.

extensive_correct.title: Numbers with RTL alignment and custom formatting

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Complex object as number

known_gaps: The import of RedXSvg2 from assets is used only in Filter component's close button.
Some SVG icons use FontAwesome (fa-regular, fa-light) classes inline rather than imported components.
quality.documentation_completeness: Comprehensive: All 17 exported components fully documented with complete signatures, detailed behavior explanations, rendered UI descriptions, and 3-tier examples (minimal, extensive, incorrect patterns). Core table components (Filter, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell) documented with state management and click handling. Utility cell renderers (TimesUI, TableButton, DurationUI, PhoneUI, BooleanUi, GeoUi, NumberUI) documented with parameter signatures and real-world usage patterns. All examples use production-ready code patterns.
